---
name: Epic
about: High-level business or product objective spanning multiple stories
title: "[Epic] <concise outcome statement>"
labels: ["type:epic"]
---

## Problem / Context
Describe the user or business problem this epic addresses.
Why does this matter now?

## Goal / Outcome
What will be true when this epic is complete?
Focus on outcomes, not implementation.

## User Value
Who benefits from this epic and how?

## Scope

### In Scope
List what is explicitly included.

### Out of Scope
List what is explicitly excluded to avoid scope creep.

## Assumptions
List assumptions being made. If incorrect, what breaks?

## Dependencies
Other epics, systems, decisions, or external factors.

## Success Metrics
How will we know this epic was successful?

## Child Stories
- [ ] #<story-id> <story title>
- [ ] #<story-id> <story title>

## Risks & Open Questions
Known risks, unknowns, or trade-offs.

## Definition of Done
- All child stories closed
- Acceptance criteria met
- No known critical issues remaining
